title: Comments on String Dynamics in Six Dimensions
abstract: We discuss the singularities in the moduli space of string compactifications to six dimensions with $N=1$ supersymmetry. Such singularities arise from either massless particles or non-critical tensionless strings. The points with tensionless strings are sometimes phase transition points between different phases of the theory. These results appear to connect all known $N=1$ supersymmetric six-dimensional vacua.
